Restructure validation workflows and fix security issues

- Combine PR validation workflows into single file
- Add security controls: prevent untrusted code execution on pull_request_target

Security improvements:
- Only label validation runs on pull_request_target \(no code checkout\)
- All code validation jobs run on pull_request/push only
- Prevents fork PRs from executing with write permissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
